links.title: India Inflation Rate - March 2022 Data - 2012-2021 Historical - April Forecast
links.description: Annual inflation rate in India increased to 6.95% in March of 2022, the highest since October of 2020, and above market forecasts of 6.35%. Food inflation accelerated for a 6th straight month to 7.68%, a new high since November of 2020, with cost of oils and fats (18.79%), vegetables (11.64%) and meat and fish (9.63%) recording again the biggest rises. links.title: The Gettysburg Powerpoint Presentation
links.description:
And now please welcome President Abraham Lincoln.
Good morning.  Just a second while I get this connection to work.  Do I 
press this button here?   Function-F7?
No, that's not right. Hmmm.  Maybe I'll have to reboot.  Hold on a minute.
Um, my name is Abe Lincoln and I'm your president. While we're waiting, I want to thank Judge David Wills, 
chairman of the committee supervising the dedication of the Gettysburg cemetery.
It's great to be here, ...
links.original_title: The Gettysburg PowerPoint Presentation (2000)
